AuxEcoSys: Introduced Upland Vegetation - Perennial Grassland and Forbland
bMIKIx-s6.memHandModelNotes:
Select large streams (would show up as open water?) -Matt E.-Buffered lg. streams, rivers and bottomland/riparian forest by 1km keep all habitat types within this buffer.

Changed INTO flowing and open water buffers from 0m to 500m. Removed brackish/salt water map unit selection. MJR 28 January 2008.

Fish and Wildlife Inventory of the Seven-County Region Included in the Central Florida Phosphate Industry Area-Wide Environmental Impact Study. Volumes I and II. Parker, J. W. 1999. Mississippi kite. In Poole A. and Gill F., eds. The birds of North America. No. 402.
Harrison, H.H. 1979. A field guide to western birds' nests. Houghton Mifflin Company, Boston. 279 pp.
Hamel, P. B. 1992. The land manager's guide to the birds of the south. The Nature Conservancy, Chapel Hill, North Carolina. 367 pp + several appendices.
